casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Howard Franlin EUBANKS 436P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 5, 2016 *682James Rainsford, Attorney at Law, Hillsborough, Cyrus Quinn Griswold, Attorney at Law, for Eubanks, Howard Franklin. Neil C. Dalton, Special Deputy Attorney General, James R. Woodall, Jr., District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd of December 2016 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of December 2016."
